General settings Notifications settings About Change voicemail greeting Set your voicemail greeting type Auto-save messages Save a local copy of newly received voicemail messages Voicemail to text Transcribe your voicemails to text Change voicemail password Set your voicemail password Notifications Display message notifications in the status bar Proximity Sensor Deactivate screen when phone is held to ear or screen is covered Continue Finish Application version Reset Account Use secure connection Application will use SSL secure connection to communicate with the server Terms No connection detected. Try later or call Voicemail for new messages. Register Skip Blablabla Bla Blabla... ATT Terms Conditions ATT What is Visual Voicemail? What is Visual Voicemail Button Save time. Review and manage your voicemail from your smartphone with AT&T Visual Voicemail. Key Features: Your Voicemail at a Glance Read text of your messages Save important messages *To use Visual Voicemail, you must allow the app to access your phone and messages. To set up Visual Voicemail, tap Begin Setup. To set up Visual Voicemail tap Call Voicemail. Visual Voicemail is a service that delivers voicemail messages right to your smartphone. No more having to call your mailbox to listen to them. With Visual Voicemail you can: View a list of your voicemail messages Play them in any order you choose Forward messages via email or MMS Save messages to your device memory or the memory card Transcribe your messages to text Cancel Start Welcome Set your personal greeting Set password Your AT&T device comes powered with AT&T Visual Voicemail. Add a Home screen shortcut Next message Previous message disabled Setup Complete Your app has been successfully setup. Tap Finish below to view your messages. From the app settings menu you can change your voicemail greeting, change your password and turn on transcription to text capabilities. Setup your personal greeting Change your personal greeting Setup your personal greeting button Change your personal greeting button Back Yesterday Today Please wait... Pref_GreetingsKey Pref_ChangePwdKey Pref_ClientSideTranscription Pref_MsgNotifications Pref_ProximitySwitcher Pref_AppVersion Pref_ResetAccount Pref_SecureConnection Pref_GroupByContact Pref_About • Custom Home Mobile Work Work Fax Home Fax Pager Other Callback Car Company Main ISDN Main Other Fax Radio Telex TTY TDD Work Mobile Work Pager Assistant MMS This action cannot be completed at this time Share your mobile number with callers Share your name with callers Share your personalized voicemail greeting with callers Use existing Create new greeting options Always Only when silent Never Play Open Delete Save Share Copy transcript Begin Setup Activate Visual Voicemail Welcome to AT&T Visual Voicemail. To complete your Visual Voicemail setup, please call voicemail using the button below. Follow the prompts to establish or enter your voicemail password. After completing, press ‘End call’ to continue setup. To complete setup, please call voicemail using the button below and enter your voicemail password if prompted. \nNote: No need to check your messages. Just end the call and the setup will continue. Oops… \n\nLooks like there’s a problem with your mailbox, or you’re on a plan that doesn’t include Visual Voicemail. Please visit att.com to change your data plan to one with VVM.\n\nAs a reminder, VVM is a free application and receiving voicemail doesn’t count against your data plan while on the AT&T network. Oops, we hit a snag… A notification required for setup hasn’t been received. Oops, we hit another snag… The notification still hasn’t been received, but you can still set up Visual Voicemail. An account verification has not been received yet, press the Call Again button below 1. Double-check that you’re connected to the AT&T data network. 2. Enter your mailbox. 2. Tap Call Again below to call your voicemail; ensure that you enter your mailbox before you hang up. 3. Answered ‘yes’ to both? 3. End the call. 3. Visit att.com or call 611 to confirm that your data plan includes Visual Voicemail. 4. Return here, tap Try Again, and continue setup. 4. Continue setting up Visual Voicemail. 4. Return here, tap Call Voicemail, and continue setup. 4. Return here, tap Call again, and continue setup. Call Again Warning SIM card was changed. Would you like to connect to the new mailbox? (previous messages will be erased). Insufficient memory There is not enough memory to download the message. Please delete previous messages. Download message failed. please try again later. Could not play message. Please try again later or call Voicemail. Your mailbox is almost full. Delete some recent messages to ensure callers are not blocked from leaving new ones. Your mailbox is full. Delete some recent messages to ensure callers are not blocked from leaving new ones. Warning! The message has been exported to: The message has been exported to: AT&T Visual Voicemail provides an email-like inbox that lets you easily view and listen to your voicemail messages in any order you choose. You can reply to callers by calling them back or sending a text message, all from within the application.

For added security AT&T recommends that you keep your Voicemail password turned on. To learn more go to att.com/vm Welcome to VVM Before accessing your mailbox, please set a personal password. Select Next to finish setup Add contact Add %s to contacts? Updating Account invalid phone number or password could not locate the subscriber profile password expired Insufficient space to download the message. Please delete old messages. Auto-save saves new messages as they arrive. To save already existing voicemail, select \'Save\' in the menu when viewing the specific message. Missing Voicemail number. No Voicemail number is stored on the SIM card. You have probably changed the password in your Voicemail. You must enter a valid password to continue. Attention Visual Voicemail setup Voicemail setup required Select to set up your Voicemail. Confirm voicemail password Incorrect voicemail password Missing voicemail password Please enter your voicemail password You must enter the correct password to be able to download new messages. If you do not know your password, call 611 to reset it. Incorrect voicemail password Visual Voicemail password incorrect Select to enter voicemail password Voicemail could not be processed to text. Delivery Failure Host Choose host from list: Or insert host manualy: Temporary Password Mailbox number: Password: Save SSL on Fake Login Visual Voicemail update Visual Voicemail update available Select to update Visual Voicemail Visual Voicemail update is available. Select to update from Android Market. All your messages, one inbox Congrats! You\'ve successfully installed AT&T Messages. Now you can view all your visual voicemails, messages and call logs from one app. Note: AT&T Visual Voicemail and AT&T Messages can\'t be used simultaneously. If you miss AT&T Visual Voicemail, uninstall AT&T Messages and reinstall AT&T Visual Voicemail. Open AT&T Messages Text has been copied to clipboard. Forgot password? Call 611 to reset it. Terms of Service Privacy Policy. AT&T visual voicemail AT&T  Visual Voicemail  Play messages in any order Read text copies of your messages Save important messages To use Visual Voicemail you must allow the app to access your phone, contacts and messages. Your voicemail at a glance By clicking Activate Visual Voicemail,\n you agree to the AT&T Visual Voicemail  and  ACTIVATE VISUAL VOICEMAIL Next - Account Setup Account Setup Error Quit Setting up your account... Hmm, something isn\'t right... We didn\'t receive the notification required to continue your AT&T Visual Voicemail setup. Check that you’re connected to the AT&T data network. Visit att.com to confirm that your data plan includes AT&T Visual Voicemail. Something went wrong... We tried to set up your account, but we couldn\'t. Visit att.com, and confirm that your plan includes Visual Voicemail. Dial 611 to contact Customer Care. Use the button below to call your voicemail.Then follow the prompts to set up your Visual Voicemail account. Hmm, something still isn\'t right... Call Voicemail Welcome to Follow these steps to set up Visual Voicemail: 1. Call your Voicemail. 2. Enter your mailbox. 3. End the call. Continue through the setup process.
